roleData.title: Data Scientist Intern
roleData.description: During my internship at \Cognitive Generation Enterprises\, I integrated databases like PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Oracle into the existing system, contributed to R&D, and optimized cloud deployments on Azure.

roleData.title: Technical Lead For GDSC TSEC
roleData.description: As the AI/ML Lead at \GDSC TSEC\, I organized hackathons, led the AI/ML event, and mentored students in real-world ML applications while driving community and technical initiatives.
